thread.section_title: Castlegatelights Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Castlegatelights | castlegatelights.co.uk | 7 of 252
thread.title: Mrs Poole

author: Mrs Poole
title: Mrs Poole
text:
we ordered a lampshade from castlegate on a Tuesday and
received it on the day agreed Thursday .the slot given too us
was between 12-32 and 13-32 and arrived at exactly 12-32
we are very impressed with the service and the professional
manner with which the company dealt with us.we would have
no hesitation in using them again in the future(we would like a special
mention to go to Cheryl)
